name: nine_points
long_description:
### AKA
* Points
### Description
* A three-person game with nine points awarded on each hole.
### Points
* When all three players tie (net), each player is awarded 3 points
* When one player wins the hole, one scores second lowest, and the last player scores third lowest, points are awarded 5, 3, 1
* When one player wins the hole, and the two others tie for second, points are awarded 5, 2, 2
* When two players tie for low, and the third player scores the second lowest, points are awarded 4, 4, 1
### Examples
| Player 1 | Player 2 | Player 3 | Points |
| -------- | -------- | -------- | ------ |
| 4 | 4 | 4 | 3, 3, 3 |
| 4 | 5 | 6 | 5, 3, 1 |
| 4 | 5 | 5 | 5, 2, 2 |
| 4 | 4 | 5 | 4, 4, 1 |
